website_summaries.verdict: The Pioneer HDJ-2000 is a no-frills, well-designed, comfortable DJ headphone pair with clean, powerful audio performance.
pros: Clean, articulate audio performance with no distortion at top volumes
Stereo/Mono switch gives DJ more control over ear-to-ear monitoring
cons: Cable features non-standard three-prong connection to ear-cupâ€”only replaceable from manufacturer directly
Cable connection jack is only on left ear

customer_reviews.title: Very nice results
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Pioneer HDJ-2000-K DJ Headphones . They sound really great and when hooked up to my receiver that has the power to really push them,they sound fantastic !! They fit very well and using them for several hours at the time don't leave you feeling like your head has been in a vise . The build quality is very good also and the mini-connector that plugs into the headphones is really substantial ,although it does take a little effort to unplug. I am glad its snug as it won't get loose thru the years of use. Overall I am VERY HAPPY with my purchase . A LOT of product for the money. WP
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best headphones on the market for under $500. I had the Sony MDR-V700 which were my favorite but they broke and Sony did not make anything as good in its replacement so I opted for Pioneer. I tried many other headsets including Beats but nothing comes close. If you want a well balanced headset with awesome sound & clarity go with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tessei Ban

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year old, these are reliable sturdy headphones. The sound quality is very good. I wouldn't compare them to audiophile headphones by any means. However for DJ cueing in a club environment the bass is full without being overbearing and provide loudness that is clean and without distortion. I purchased the case to protect my investment. I have experienced no problems with the removable cable at this time.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headphones
customer_reviews.text: They may not be the best DJ phones out there, but for the price, Pioneer always delivers. They don't slack in any area, have less bass than the typical DJ phone, more clarity in the mids, and are incredibly comfortable. These are the first phones that i've worn easily for 6-7 even 8 hours at a time, without hassle or any of the usual stress that come with wearing headphones. And well, given the quality, and that they may be slightly less sonically desirable than the best phones out there, for their purpose, they do an amazing job. Comfort is really amazin especially when paired with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: After weeks and weeks of review reading, I bought these instead of the Sennnheiser MKII's - They were on sale for under $200 - I DJ with these plugged into my Pioneer DDJ-SX, and the construction is solid, sound great, LOOK even better, and are holding up to sweaty 5 hour sets without any problems whatsoever. Would buy again! Just the way they look gives you that credibility you might be looking for if you're like me - my old cans were a freebie set of beater Nadys that did the job, but just didn't excite my fans like these do.
customer_reviews.author: W. Paul Lothary

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, ears hurt after prolonged wearing
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound and overall design. Switch mono/stereo is a nice feature - some records I have require switching stereo to mono. It's not noise-cancelling, so some noise does trickle through - not a problem. The problem I didn't expect based on the look is that it's somewhat shallow for my ears. After some time I have to adjust them on the ears in various way to lighten the impact. Eventually, I need to take headphones off to give ears some rest.
customer_reviews.author: M. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Great DJ Headphones
customer_reviews.text: After discovering the 1000's are made of plastic, I was leary about getting another pair from Pioneer, but this pair far exceeded my expectations! The hinges are made of metal, and should last with all the rigors of DJ work. The sound is fantastic across the entire spectrum! Crisp highs, clear mids, and solid bass. They come with a soft case, but I recommend getting the exoskeleton case to better protect your investment on the road, or from being thrown around inside a road case, like mine are.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: I want another pair!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Real HDJ's not the fake ones. Honest price, my favorite pair of pioneers so far. Have been using them for a few years now and the audio quality is crystal clear!!!
customer_reviews.author: asdfafa

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable DJ 'phones
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing replacement 'phones for sometime, but leery of which pair to pick up for the $$ spent. I've had Sony & the Pioneer HDJ1000, and swiveled both to death, severing the cords. I saw this pair, and once I tried them on I knew these were the ones. The swivel is amazing, and the cord is placed far from where any hinges can cause any damage to them. The ear piece is a little bigger than I'd prefer, but they are super comfortable. Cannot wait to use them this weekend. Also, super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: samanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellend headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. I DJ and have been using for a few months now. Got it from Amazon Warehouse deal that was noted as used, but looks brand new. Good bass and highs. Flexible and not as heavy as others. Would recommend. I got it for 150 during clearance which is a STEAL!
customer_reviews.author: booda

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone by far
customer_reviews.text: I am a music producer and work with headphones for many hours some times even the whole day. This headphone is comfortable throughout the whole day, where other headphones started to get itchy ears or sweaty. The sound quality is really good for sound engineering, it is balanced out so well. Worth every penny! If you can afford it, you should buy these, they will last for ever.
customer_reviews.author: Bas

customer_reviews.title: Still great quality of sound flowing through your ears and worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Still using it and I just needed to replace the cord twice and the ear pads once. Still great quality of sound flowing through your ears and worth every penny despite I use it at all times almost and I am kind of harsh in using.
customer_reviews.author: Caner Ozer

customer_reviews.title: Great Balance
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a pair of HDJ-1000s and used them for almost seven years before they finally fell apart. I've tested "Beats" studio cans by Dre and Numark Red waves. I found "Beats" to be too bass heavy and cheap with its plastic construction. Numark had a great sound buy it was a bit muddy on the high end. I wanted DJ headphones which were well constructed(won't fall apart after a few months of use),comfortable to wear and yielded a crystal clear balanced sound. HDJ-2000s delivers all that at a better price point Bose or other high end cans.
customer_reviews.author: Steve N Maya

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and flexible for DJing
customer_reviews.text: i owe thre pair see other reviews and owned 4 - gave one away. Great sound and flexible for DJing. Don't waste time with other celebrity headphone - pound for pound a great headphone -Again i put my money were my mouth
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A Williams

customer_reviews.title: HDJ 2000? more like HDJ over 9000!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They isolate well which is what I crave when djing. It enhances the bottom end a little so be advise of that if that is not what you want. So far very durable. Use these at all my gigs.
customer_reviews.author: bakari

customer_reviews.title: Top Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This was a much needed upgrade to my older HD-1000's. I must say I'm digging the new cans a lot! Comfy and crisp, Don't waste money buying dre-beats aka monster headphones, get these instead, trust me they are better, way better!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier this headphones are perfect for djing. They are confortable, they are strong, look great and sound great. They are not too heavy either.
customer_reviews.author: adr7an

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was selling for 100 more at best buy, I ended up getting it for under 200 on Amazon, the sound quality is great, the comfort is great, and the headset is flexible and looks stylish. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ramin Faramarzi

customer_reviews.title: The best sound
customer_reviews.text: I had the Sony MDR V700 for years and I decided to give this a try, the sound is amazing, loud enough for the club and very comfortable to the ear. I love that I can change the cable and the ear pads
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Great headset.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these headphones for a while now, Really enjoy them, Great sound quality pretty balanced as well. Primarily used for djing and occasionally for gaming. The removable cable makes it a breeze when I'm mobile so things don't get tangled. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Timson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic headphones. Well worth the price tag. Better than any headphones on the market. Can wear for hours for casual music or movies, or DJ for hours on end with absolutely no discomfort. Very light for how sturdy they are. I have no fear in these breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Collin DeCamp

customer_reviews.title: Best set of headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best set of headphones I have ever owned. I got these to replace my classic but broken Sony MDR V700s. I loved those headphones but the right ear stopped working on me. I decided to pick these up after listening with them. Such clear, crisp sound and I really like the color. I like these so much I am planning to buy them in white and standard aluminum to have back up pairs just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best DJ headphones
customer_reviews.text: I'm extremely happy with these headphones. Quality rocks. Best noise cancellation ever. Every DJ should have them. I would recommend them to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Koen Okhuijzen

customer_reviews.title: DJ'ing made easy
customer_reviews.text: You need a good set of headphones to really hear the quality of music when DJ'ing and these headphones did the trick! I find them better then the Beats everyone wants nowadays. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I like the snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I like the snug fit, it's comfortable with just the right pressure not clamping nor compresses your head, sound quality is superb though lacks the punchy base but quality is at par with the premium brands in the market. It does looks great as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sounding, best value for money, don't waste your time and money on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Head phone feed back
customer_reviews.text: I like them a lot , sounds great , Very snug around the ears and head band , would recommend to any mobile Dj looking for a great sounding head phone!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DreDRE

customer_reviews.title: I like...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product meets expectations 100%, so we have no hesitation in recommending it. also preceded by the level of quality, which is a well known reference brand.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound very good, crisp highs, the lows feel true, and you get a good sense of an environment of music when you put these on. At first they are very comfortable, but after a long period of time they start to hurt my ears. Idk if It is just me though. Still, these are QUALITY, and I listen to them all day everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best DJ headphones out there from my experience. Works well in loud clubs and in studios
customer_reviews.author: Eric Kim

customer_reviews.title: Loved at first but over-time lost sound in one ear
customer_reviews.text: Will be looking into the warranty situation as at first I LOVED these and thought they were/are AMAZING! Somehow over time one earphone stopped working these were always treated responsibly as expensive mint DJing headphones and have never been dropped or misused. Seems a unique issue and I'm positive to figure out a resolution. Overall these rank as the best headphones out on the market for DJing and there isn't much debate about that, they stand alone in 1st place.
customer_reviews.author: MikeVertx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I've ever used. I'm absolutely thrilled with them. I highly recommend them to all music enthusiasts willing to spend a little bit more for top-notch equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Emmet Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bad ass cans item as described well worth my $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Christy Turner

customer_reviews.title: One of the best headphones in the market
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing not just for dj'ing. They are the most comfortable headphones i own i could wear these for a long period of time and still be comfortable. The build quality these headphones have are great , its light weight and ear cushion make the headphone pleasurable. Great durability also. Its a must buy if your into headphones !
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased numerous headphones in the past, and I can confidently state these are the best sounding most comfortable headphones I have ever owned. A vast improvement to the HDJ-1000 headphones, which are another pair of excellent sounding headphones. I would highly recommend these reasonably priced headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie Lazar

customer_reviews.title: a GIFT
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these.....gave them to him for an early birthday present...and better then the Dre beets headphones (which he had previously)
customer_reviews.author: Jean Nogiec

customer_reviews.title: Appreciate the durability the best as well as the great sound they produce
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these headphones. Appreciate the durability the best as well as the great sound they produce! Was lucky to get these black polished ones at a steal of a price here on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, nice and light. Clean sound- Not too much Bass. Doesn't distort when turned up loud. . . .
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Niiiiiiice
customer_reviews.text: This is THE headphones if you want to DJ. Forget about other brands (specially BEATS) when you want to DJ. This headphone sounds amazing and is very easy to manage when djing.
customer_reviews.author: Gui

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this headphone clear sound and deep, very great for djing. I love it the only complaint is that you have only one cable .
customer_reviews.author: kawnee

customer_reviews.title: love my pioneer HDJ 2000
customer_reviews.text: love my pioneer HDJ 2000, if you are buying this and expect good mobility may not be your headphone, cord is heavy and once ran with it, cord stopped working had to replace the cord for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: hdj2000
customer_reviews.text: At first I didn't liked them because you could hear everything from the outside but once you put music into them the outside noise dissapears. I have tried them with high volumes and still work perfect. The way you can pack them is nice they don't use any space at all and they are very flexible and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Caballero

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: These head phones are brilliant. Superb build and amazing sound whether casually listening or producing music. Use them with my iPod and creating EDM in Ableton. Highly recommended over any headphone brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Worley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'd buy again, don't buy the 1500 model. Stick with these
customer_reviews.author: Roxann

customer_reviews.title: Its a pair of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have had the 1000s and the high, mid, and bass are just perfect on these beast of headphones. They are perfect for in-studio producing but I wouldnt use at a gag. The HDJs are known for their hinges for breaking easy but i have the issue of this happening to me because i treat them like like gold. Overall they are great headphones for in-studio sessions not gags
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: and he said never had been like this great sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my boyfriend, and he said never had been like this great sound. Also Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jeehye han

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit with great sound. I never understood why people bought headphones from companies that don't MAKE SPEAKERS! Beats by Dre headphones do not compare in the slightest sense.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: SATISFACTION GUARANTEE
customer_reviews.text: Best headphone i ever bought! Guaranteed satisfaction, sound quality, comfortabilty even hours of music listening, no strain effect to ear and head..guarateed 5 star recommended to all pro and non pro djs...
customer_reviews.author: Engelbert

customer_reviews.title: i love em for the club
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome for club use! love em. light, comfortable, loud, only downside is im going deaf from from listening to mixes to loud.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything I wanted in good shape, at the price I needed. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME HEADPHONES !!!!
customer_reviews.text: these are just what i was looking for they sound great they feel great they dont hurt your head after continuous use hour after hour on and off your head the mono and stereo switch BIG plus ! love these headphones ! perfect for djing or just for regular use
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: The sound is OUTSTANDING!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have!!! I absolutely love them. I'm use them 8 hours plus a day at least 4 days a week. They are pure heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dj workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Crisp boominf sound, solid construction, flexible yet rigid. Perfect for professionals and amateurs alike.Superb value/price iff < $210. Definitely recommened.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Daras

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Great Sound Great product, Played BF3 with it, i heard sounds that i never heard before , Prefect Pioneer HDJ
customer_reviews.author: Nabil K

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, the feel, the lightness, the portability. Pioneer makes great products and this one is certainly an example of great products.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Nelson

customer_reviews.title: really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: i really enjoy this headphones .. i recommend to the people who like a really quality sound .. good deal :)
customer_reviews.author: rafa_fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Best head phones ever!!  ....yeah better than Dr. Drew headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Great looks, very durable, deliverers excellent sound headphones. Recommend them to DJs or someone who wants to get the best out of the headphones. Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable heaedphones. sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable heaedphones. sound quality is amazing. My only complaint would be that I wish they fit a little tighter but then again that is probably why they feel so good on my head. I would recommend getting a hard case for them to protect them better. Just my opinion, but not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: polo cuellar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made with high sound quality. Bought them to be used as DJ headphones, but they are so superior to any other headphones we have that they are used for all purposes. Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer is the best
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones. No problems. Expensive though. Probably should have shopped more but ... $$$$ playas dont play Only Con is that they have some crazy adapter that the cord plugs into the actual headphones with, which I hear if you damage is like 200$. Stupid proprietary s***.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM- EXACTLY WHAT I EXPECTED & PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: I'M A DISC JOCKEY & UPCOMING EDM PRODUCER AND THESE ARE NEXT TO THE TOP OF THE LINE STUDIO MONITORS
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Gooden

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the black ones
customer_reviews.text: Got this black pair for $110 less than the silver pair, so very happy. Made the price more comparable to other head phones in this catagory
customer_reviews.author: Bart Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are awesome, great quality and great comfort as well. No complaints whatsoever. If you buy them you will not regret it
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: erfwedw
customer_reviews.text: everyything works fine, i loved it, no damage, here on time. nothing bad to sy about it, continue using this suppolier
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Camilli

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: i like it. sound is great , i can feel the sound. i recomended 0 0 0 0 0 0 0
customer_reviews.author: miroslav

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: I originally had a pair of HDJ-2000's that got stolen from me. Long story. Anyway, I got these as a replacement. Just as awesome as the 2000's, just a different color. I prefer it a bit more :)
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of HDJ-2000 the only reason I bought my second pair cause someone stole them from me I loved loved my first set never had any problems the sound is amazing and there built like a tank never had any hinge problems like another review wrote I recommend these headphones if your a DJ or just want a pair of great sounding headphones. Ive had other high priced headphones and the are my favorite ones
customer_reviews.author: DJ SAINT

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer HDJ-2000-K DJ Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these for my one of my fellow dj friends who I spin with on the radio and do production with. I just happen to use them one night while doing our radio show and they were impressive. I think they will be my next pair.
customer_reviews.author: B Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Expected some kind of open package/used item, BUT NOT A DISPLAY MODEL!
customer_reviews.text: I did quite an amount of searching for these headphones and found these at a real great price! Having purchased from Amazon hundreds of times, I was a bit disappointed when I received my order from this vendor. I kept it because I considered what I paid for it. However, my item had all kinds of store stickers on it, and a safety tie to keep the detachable cord form being removed. The right headphone was loose and the snap-back spring was broken..all these discrepencies led me to believe these were store returns/display models. Like I said, I kept it considering the price was half of buying new?
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Julien

customer_reviews.title: The clarity and sound separation I get out of the V700 is just far superior. After doing some research it looks like DJ ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned a pair of Sony V700 DJ headphones. The audio quality of these is noticeably inferior. They are also not as loud as the V700. The clarity and sound separation I get out of the V700 is just far superior. After doing some research it looks like DJ headphones audio quality is not important compared to things like noise isolation, loudness and bass enhancement, so you'll likely get the same audio quality with most top-of-the-line headphones. I care for isolation and loudness but I am personally not willing to compromise in sound quality, so I returned these. On the bright side the build quality seems to be outstanding, they are sexy-looking and luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Rockett

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 2 months of light use. Not constructed well.
customer_reviews.author: Cincy DJ

customer_reviews.title: I thought they looked nice though ill stick to my vmoda crossfades and audio ...
customer_reviews.text: I only rate this three stars because I didn't get to listen to them when they arrived the right hinge was broke so I just sent them back without listening amazon did nothing wrong it could have been a problem with other models s ive heard they break under normal wear. I thought they looked nice though ill stick to my vmoda crossfades and audio tech 700mk2s there more built like a cannon
customer_reviews.author: jo drake

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphone to replace the V-moda Crossfade headphone (which nothing was wrong with). I found no difference between the two headphones, the two were equally good.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice design! Good sound but not enough boost using portable players.
customer_reviews.text: Overall good quality headphones. Leather is soft and doesn't irritate my ears. Sound quality pretty good however I think with the amp would be better performance. Comparing with other brands I think Pioneer did a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas P Pawlak

customer_reviews.title: A good break reminder.
customer_reviews.text: This is a year in the making and I'll start with the bad. the ear pads are just bad. The only thing worse than bad ear pads are non removable ones. After listening to them for 20 minutes you can feel the driver digging into your ears. They sound fine but what great are a good sounding headphones that you can't wear for any length of time. You know what they are great for? Work. They remind you to get up and take a break semi-regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: They are ok,
customer_reviews.text: They are ok, not $200++ Ok. I had the HDJ 1000 I bought for $99 and they sounded as good. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: vaddi reddy

customer_reviews.title: Bass
customer_reviews.text: I can't hear the basses, and they are not noise cancelling, they are only comfortable, but they have nothing else mentionned in the description
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien

customer_reviews.title: the 1/4 adapter plug for the headphones was not in the so called unopened box and this is the first time but hopefully the last
customer_reviews.text: They were presented to me as an unused item that had minor damages on the box put all parts and accessory were intact and okay but they weren't! The item was not only used it had one important piece missing. the 1/4 adapter plug for the headphones was not in the so called unopened box and this is the first time but hopefully the last time that I have a bad experience with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: J

product_meta.title: Pioneer HDJ-2000-K DJ Headphones
product_meta.description: The HDJ-2000 is Pioneer's premier professional headphone. Featuring lightweight magnesium construction and high flux magnets, the HDJ-2000 represents the best in sound quality, fit and durability.
feature_bullets: High-Fidelity Sound Design Optimal For All DJs
Snug Fit For Comfortable Use Even In Long Sessions
Flexible protein leather with a soft touch and natural feel is used for ear pad/head pad surfaces that touch the skin

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars150 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
